tool_description: You can search address from zip code , or zip code from address in Japan. Use this API to find postcodes and detailed addresses from over 100,000 address information across Japan. Updated monthly with the latest data from Japan Post.
name: Search Japanese PostCode
title: Search Japanese PostCode

api_list.name: search-by-zipcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geekfeed-search-japanese-postcode-v1.p.rapidapi.com/search-address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geekfeed-search-japanese-postcode-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: search-by-details
api_list.description: search zip code and address by prefecture/city/town area.(maximum 10) You can find the list even if you input a part of address.
